91#define NCPP_RCLASS(ClassName) \
92 private:\
93 using current_rclass = ClassName;\
94 ncpp::rtti::robject_constructor_begin_scope __##ClassName##_constructor_begin_scope__;\
95 public:\
96 virtual ncpp::rtti::rclass_t<ncpp::rtti::robject_i> get_rclass(){\
97 \
98 return ncpp::rtti::rclass_t<ClassName>();\
99 }\
100 static inline ncpp::rtti::rclass_t<ClassName> get_static_rclass() {\
101 \
102 return ncpp::rtti::rclass_t<ClassName>(); \
103 }
104
109#define NCPP_RCSCOPE(ClassName) \
110 ncpp::rtti::robject_constructor_end_scope __robject_constructor_end_scope__(*this, *(__##ClassName##_constructor_begin_scope__.prev_robject_ref));
111
115#define NCPP_RCVARIABLE(MemberType, MemberName, ...) \
116 MemberType MemberName;\
117 char MemberName##_name_cstr[sizeof(#MemberName)] = #MemberName;\
118 using MemberName##_args_type = typename ncpp::rtti::robject_member_args_t<__VA_ARGS__>;\
119 MemberName##_args_type MemberName##_args = {__VA_ARGS__}; \
120 using MemberName##_reflecter_type = ncpp::rtti::robject_variable_reflecter_t<\
121 current_rclass, \
122 MemberType, \
123 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName##_name_cstr),\
124 &current_rclass::MemberName##_name_cstr,\
125 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName##_args),\
126 &current_rclass::MemberName##_args,\
127 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName),\
128 &current_rclass::MemberName\
129 >; \
130 friend class MemberName##_reflecter_type; \
131 MemberName##_reflecter_type MemberName##_reflecter;
132
136#define NCPP_RCFUNCTION(MemberFunctionType, MemberName,...) \
137 using MemberName##_type = MemberFunctionType; \
138 MemberName##_type MemberName; \
139 char MemberName##_name_cstr[sizeof(#MemberName)] = #MemberName;\
140 typename ncpp::rtti::robject_member_args_t<__VA_ARGS__> MemberName##_args = {__VA_ARGS__}; \
141 using MemberName##_reflecter_type = ncpp::rtti::robject_function_reflecter_t<\
142 current_rclass, \
143 MemberFunctionType, \
144 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName##_name_cstr),\
145 &current_rclass::MemberName##_name_cstr,\
146 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName##_args),\
147 &current_rclass::MemberName##_args,\
148 decltype(&current_rclass::MemberName), \
149 &current_rclass::MemberName \
150 >; \
151 friend class MemberName##_reflecter_type; \
152 MemberName##_reflecter_type MemberName##_reflecter;

199 class robject_constructor_begin_scope;
200 class robject_constructor_end_scope;
201
202
203
207 class robject_constructor_begin_scope {
208
209 friend class robject_i;
210
211 public:
212 utilities::lref_t<robject_i> prev_robject_ref;
213
214 public:
215 robject_constructor_begin_scope();
216 ~robject_constructor_begin_scope();
217
218 };
219
223 class robject_constructor_end_scope {
224
225 friend class robject_i;
226
227 public:
228 utilities::lref_t<robject_i> prev_robject_ref;
229
230 public:
231 robject_constructor_end_scope(robject_i& robject, robject_i& prev_robject);
232 inline robject_constructor_end_scope() :
233 robject_constructor_end_scope(*utilities::lref_t<robject_i>(), *utilities::lref_t<robject_i>())
234 {}
235 ~robject_constructor_end_scope();
236
237 };

258 struct robject_member_handle {
259
260 struct args_array_type {
261
262 sz* head_arg_p = 0;
263 sz arg_count = 0;
264
265 inline const sz& head() const {
266
267 return *head_arg_p;
268 }
269 inline const sz& tail() const {
270
271 return *(head_arg_p + arg_count - 1);
272 }
273 inline const sz* begin() const {
274
275 return head_arg_p;
276 }
277 inline const sz* end() const {
278
279 return head_arg_p + arg_count;
280 }
281
282 };
283
284
285
286 using logger_func_type = void(*)(std::ostream& os, const robject_member_handle& member_handle);
287
288
289
290 args_array_type args_array;
291 b8 is_function = 0;
292 logger_func_type logger_func_ptr = 0;
293 void* member_ptr_p = 0;
294
295
296
297 inline robject_member_handle() {
298
299
300 }
301 inline robject_member_handle(const robject_member_handle& other) :
302 args_array(other.args_array),
303 is_function(other.is_function),
304 logger_func_ptr(other.logger_func_ptr),
305 member_ptr_p(other.member_ptr_p)
306 {
307
308
309
310 }
311 inline robject_member_handle& operator = (const robject_member_handle& other) {
312
313 args_array = other.args_array;
314 is_function = other.is_function;
315 logger_func_ptr = other.logger_func_ptr;
316 member_ptr_p = other.member_ptr_p;
317
318 return *this;
319 }
320
321
322
323 friend inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const robject_member_handle& member_handle)
324 {
325
326 member_handle.logger_func_ptr(os, member_handle);
327
328 return os;
329 }

332
338 template<typename type__>
339 using recorrected_type_t = typename utilities::nth_template_arg_t<
340 utilities::is_function_t<type__>::value,
341 type__,
342 typename std::function<type__>
343 >::type;
344
345
346
350 template<typename type__>
351 inline recorrected_type_t<type__>& to_t() {
352
353 return *reinterpret_cast<recorrected_type_t<type__>*>(member_ptr_p);
354 }
355
359 template<typename type__>
360 inline recorrected_type_t<const type__>& to_t() const {
361
362 return *reinterpret_cast<recorrected_type_t<const type__>*>(member_ptr_p);
363 }
364
365
366
370 template<typename type__>
371 inline robject_member_handle& operator = (type__&& other) {
372
373 static_assert(!utilities::is_function_t<type__>::value && "type__ must not be function type");
374 assert(!is_function && "this is not function");
375
376 to_t<std::remove_reference<type__>::type>() = std::forward<type__>(other);
377
378 return *this;
379 }
380
381
382
386 template<typename type__>
387 inline b8 operator == (type__&& other) {
388
389 static_assert(!utilities::is_function_t<type__>::value && "type__ must not be function type");
390 assert(!is_function && "this is not function");
391
392 return to_t<std::remove_reference<type__>::type>() == std::forward<type__>(other);
393 }
394
398 template<typename type__>
399 inline b8 operator != (type__&& other) {
400
401 static_assert(!utilities::is_function_t<type__>::value && "type__ must not be function type");
402 assert(!is_function && "this is not function");
403
404 return to_t<std::remove_reference<type__>::type>() != std::forward<type__>(other);
405 }
406
410 template<typename type__>
411 inline b8 operator > (type__&& other) {
412
413 static_assert(!utilities::is_function_t<type__>::value && "type__ must not be function type");
414 assert(!is_function && "this is not function");
415
416 return to_t<std::remove_reference<type__>::type>() > std::forward<type__>(other);
417 }
418
422 template<typename type__>
423 inline b8 operator < (type__ && other) {
424
425 static_assert(!utilities::is_function_t<type__>::value && "type__ must not be function type");
426 assert(!is_function && "this is not function");
427
428 return to_t<std::remove_reference<type__>::type>() < std::forward<type__>(other);
429 }
430
434 template<typename type__>
435 inline b8 operator >= (type__&& other) {
436
437 static_assert(!utilities::is_function_t<type__>::value && "type__ must not be function type");
438 assert(!is_function && "this is not function");
439
440 return to_t<std::remove_reference<type__>::type>() >= std::forward<type__>(other);
441 }
442
446 template<typename type__>
447 inline b8 operator <= (type__&& other) {
448
449 static_assert(!utilities::is_function_t<type__>::value && "type__ must not be function type");
450 assert(!is_function && "this is not function");
451
452 return to_t<std::remove_reference<type__>::type>() <= std::forward<type__>(other);
453 }
454
455 };

573 class robject_i {
574
575 NCPP_RCLASS(robject_i);
576
580
581 public:
582 using name_to_member_handle_map_type = typename containers::native_unordered_map_t<containers::native_string, robject_member_handle>;
583
584 friend class robject_constructor_scope;
585
589
590 private:
591 name_to_member_handle_map_type name_to_member_handle_map_;
592
593 public:
594 inline name_to_member_handle_map_type::iterator begin() {
595
596 return name_to_member_handle_map_.begin();
597 }
598 inline name_to_member_handle_map_type::const_iterator begin() const {
599
600 return name_to_member_handle_map_.cbegin();
601 }
602 inline name_to_member_handle_map_type::const_iterator cbegin() const {
603
604 return name_to_member_handle_map_.cbegin();
605 }
606
607 inline name_to_member_handle_map_type::iterator end() {
608
609 return name_to_member_handle_map_.end();
610 }
611 inline name_to_member_handle_map_type::const_iterator end() const {
612
613 return name_to_member_handle_map_.cend();
614 }
615 inline name_to_member_handle_map_type::const_iterator cend() const {
616
617 return name_to_member_handle_map_.cend();
618 }
619
623
624#pragma region Constructors, Destructor and Operators
625 public:
626 robject_i();
627 virtual ~robject_i();
628
632 inline robject_member_handle& operator [] (const containers::native_string& member_name) {
633
634 if (name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name) != name_to_member_handle_map_.end())
635 return name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name)->second;
636
637 return *utilities::lref_t<robject_member_handle>();
638 }
642 inline const robject_member_handle& operator [] (const containers::native_string& member_name) const {
643
644 if (name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name) != name_to_member_handle_map_.end())
645 return name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name)->second;
646
647 return *utilities::lref_t<const robject_member_handle>();
648 }
649#pragma endregion
650
654
655#pragma region Methods
656 public:
660 inline b8 is_has_member(const containers::native_string& member_name) {
661
662 if (name_to_member_handle_map_.find(member_name) != name_to_member_handle_map_.end())
663 return true;
664
665 return false;
666 }
667
671 inline void add_member_handle(const containers::native_string& member_name, const robject_member_handle& handle) {
672
673 assert(!is_has_member(member_name) && "member already existed");
674
675 name_to_member_handle_map_[member_name] = handle;
676
677 }
678
682 template<typename variable_type__>
683 inline variable_type__& var_t(const containers::native_string& var_name) {
684
685 return var_handle(var_name).get_t<variable_type__>();
686 }
687
691 template<typename function_type__>
692 inline std::function<function_type__>& func_t(const containers::native_string& func_name) {
693
694 return func_handle(func_name).get_t<function_type__>();
695 }
696#pragma endregion
697
698 };
699

717 template<
718 class object_type__,
719 typename variable_type__,
720 typename name_member_ptr_type,
721 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
722 typename args_member_ptr_type,
723 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
724 typename member_ptr_type,
725 member_ptr_type member_ptr
726 >
727 robject_variable_reflecter_t<
728 object_type__,
729 variable_type__,
730 name_member_ptr_type,
731 name_member_ptr,
732 args_member_ptr_type,
733 args_member_ptr,
734 member_ptr_type,
735 member_ptr
736 >::robject_variable_reflecter_t() {
737
738 object_type__& robj = (object_type__&)current_constructing_object();
739
740 robject_member_handle rvar_handle;
741 rvar_handle.args_array = {
742 (robj.*args_member_ptr).data(),
743 (robj.*args_member_ptr).size()
744 };
745 rvar_handle.is_function = 0;
746 rvar_handle.member_ptr_p = &(robj.*member_ptr);
747
748 rvar_handle.logger_func_ptr = [](std::ostream& os, const robject_member_handle& member_handle) {
749
750 os << *reinterpret_cast<variable_type__*>(member_handle.member_ptr_p);
751
752 };
753
754 robj.add_member_handle(robj.*name_member_ptr, rvar_handle);
755
756 }
757

759 class object_type__,
760 typename variable_type__,
761 typename name_member_ptr_type,
762 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
763 typename args_member_ptr_type,
764 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
765 typename member_ptr_type,
766 member_ptr_type member_ptr
767 >
768 robject_variable_reflecter_t<
769 object_type__,
770 variable_type__,
771 name_member_ptr_type,
772 name_member_ptr,
773 args_member_ptr_type,
774 args_member_ptr,
775 member_ptr_type,
776 member_ptr
777 >::~robject_variable_reflecter_t() {
778
779
780
781 }

799 template<
800 class object_type__,
801 typename function_type__,
802 typename name_member_ptr_type,
803 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
804 typename args_member_ptr_type,
805 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
806 typename member_ptr_type,
807 member_ptr_type member_ptr
808 >
809 robject_function_reflecter_t<
810 object_type__,
811 function_type__,
812 name_member_ptr_type,
813 name_member_ptr,
814 args_member_ptr_type,
815 args_member_ptr,
816 member_ptr_type,
817 member_ptr
818 >::robject_function_reflecter_t(){
819
820 object_type__& robj = (object_type__&)current_constructing_object();
821
822 using function_traits = typename utilities::function_traits_t<function_type__>;
823
824 using executer_getter_type = typename robject_function_reflecter_executer_get_t<
825 object_type__,
826 function_type__,
827 std::is_same_v<function_traits::result_type, void>,
828 name_member_ptr_type,
829 name_member_ptr,
830 args_member_ptr_type,
831 args_member_ptr,
832 member_ptr_type,
833 member_ptr
834 >;
835
836 executer_type rfunc_executer = executer_getter_type::get(robj);
837
838 robject_member_handle rfunc_handle;
839 rfunc_handle.args_array = {
840 (robj.*args_member_ptr).data(),
841 (robj.*args_member_ptr).size()
842 };
843 rfunc_handle.is_function = 1;
844 rfunc_handle.member_ptr_p = reinterpret_cast<void*>(rfunc_executer);
845
846 rfunc_handle.logger_func_ptr = [](std::ostream& os, const robject_member_handle& member_handle) {
847
848 os << typeid(function_type__).name() << " { " << member_handle.member_ptr_p << " }";
849
850 };
851
852 robj.add_member_handle(robj.*name_member_ptr, rfunc_handle);
853
854 }
855

857 class object_type__,

859 typename name_member_ptr_type,

861 typename args_member_ptr_type,
862 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
863 typename member_ptr_type,
864 member_ptr_type member_ptr
865 >

867 object_type__,
868 function_type__,
869 name_member_ptr_type,
870 name_member_ptr,
871 args_member_ptr_type,
872 args_member_ptr,
873 member_ptr_type,
874 member_ptr
875 >::~robject_function_reflecter_t() {
876
877
878
879 }

881 template<
882 class object_type__,
883 typename function_type__,
884 typename name_member_ptr_type,
885 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
886 typename args_member_ptr_type,
887 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
888 typename member_ptr_type,
889 member_ptr_type member_ptr
890 >
891 struct robject_function_reflecter_executer_get_t <
892 object_type__,
893 function_type__,
894 true,
895 name_member_ptr_type,
896 name_member_ptr,
897 args_member_ptr_type,
898 args_member_ptr,
899 member_ptr_type,
900 member_ptr
901 >
902 {
903
904 using executer_type = typename robject_function_reflecter_t<
905 object_type__,
906 function_type__,
907 name_member_ptr_type,
908 name_member_ptr,
909 args_member_ptr_type,
910 args_member_ptr,
911 member_ptr_type,
912 member_ptr
913 >::executer_type;
914
915 using function_traits = typename utilities::function_traits_t<function_type__>;
916
917 static inline executer_type get(object_type__& robj) {
918
919 static std::function<function_type__> func_s = [&robj](auto&&... args) -> function_traits::result_type {
920
921 (robj.*member_ptr)(std::forward<decltype(args)>(args)...);
922
923 };
924
925 return &func_s;
926 }
927
928 };
929
930 template<
931 class object_type__,
932 typename function_type__,
933 typename name_member_ptr_type,
934 name_member_ptr_type name_member_ptr,
935 typename args_member_ptr_type,
936 args_member_ptr_type args_member_ptr,
937 typename member_ptr_type,
938 member_ptr_type member_ptr
939 >
940 struct robject_function_reflecter_executer_get_t <
941 object_type__,
942 function_type__,
943 false,
944 name_member_ptr_type,
945 name_member_ptr,
946 args_member_ptr_type,
947 args_member_ptr,
948 member_ptr_type,
949 member_ptr
950 >
951 {
952
953 using executer_type = typename robject_function_reflecter_t<
954 object_type__,
955 function_type__,
956 name_member_ptr_type,
957 name_member_ptr,
958 args_member_ptr_type,
959 args_member_ptr,
960 member_ptr_type,
961 member_ptr
962 >::executer_type;
963
964 using function_traits = typename utilities::function_traits_t<function_type__>;
965
966 static inline executer_type get(object_type__& robj) {
967
968 static std::function<function_type__> func_s = [&robj](auto&&... args) -> function_traits::result_type {
969
970 return (robj.*member_ptr)(std::forward<decltype(args)>(args)...);
971
972 };
973
974 return &func_s;
975 }
976
977 };
978
979
980
981 inline std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, const robject_i& obj)
982 {
983
984 static asz tab_count = 0;
985
986 os << "{" << std::endl;
987
988 ++tab_count;
989
990 for (const auto& member_handle : obj) {
991
992 for (sz i = 0; i < tab_count; ++i) {
993
994 os << " ";
995
996 }
997
998 os << '"' << member_handle.first << '"' << ": " << member_handle.second << std::endl;
999
1000 }
1001
1002 --tab_count;
1003
1004 for (sz i = 0; i < tab_count; ++i) {
1005
1006 os << " ";
1007
1008 }
1009 os << "}";
1010
1011 return os;
1012 }
1013
1014 }
